[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-data-service/src/metrics.rs] [Missing Metric] Is there a metric for tracking duplicate connections with the same labels, or can connection hijacking attempts go undetected? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-data-service/src/metrics.rs] [Cross-Metric Consistency] Can LATEST_PROCESSED_VERSION_PER_PROCESSOR decrease while PROCESSED_VERSIONS_COUNT_PER_PROCESSOR increases, indicating logic inconsistency or rollback attack? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-data-service/src/metrics.rs] [Metric Staleness] If a processor stops updating metrics, how long before monitoring detects it - can attackers exploit this window to hide indexer compromise? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-data-service/src/metrics.rs] [Data Loss] If metrics fail to update due to errors, is there any retry mechanism or are transaction counts permanently lost affecting billing accuracy? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-data-service/src/metrics.rs] [GDPR] [Privacy] Do email labels in Prometheus metrics violate GDPR Article 32 requiring appropriate technical measures for processing personal data? (High)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-data-service/src/metrics.rs] [GDPR] [Right to Erasure] Can user email addresses be removed from historical Prometheus metrics upon request, or does metric persistence violate GDPR right to erasure? (High)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-data-service/src/metrics.rs] [CCPA] [Privacy] Does tracking per-email metrics constitute 'sale' of personal information under CCPA if metrics are shared with third-party monitoring services? (Medium)
